item.title: VoiceInk Updates
item.description:
VoiceInk v0.31 Release Notes

✨ Bug Fixes

  • 🎯 Fixed double pasting transcription with keyboard shortcut bug

VoiceInk v0.30 Release Notes

✨ New Improvements

  • 🎯 Choose between right option key or the function key for push-to-talk feature now

VoiceInk v0.29 Release Notes

✨ New Improvements

  • 🎯 Added the option to copy transcript to clipboard

VoiceInk v0.28 Release Notes

✨ New Fixes

  • 🎯 FIxed High CPU usages even when the app is idle
  • 🕰️ Fixed the efficiency calculator not working properly
  • 🤝 Fixed the purchase URL not working

VoiceInk v0.27 Release Notes

✨ New Fixes

  • 🎯 Rewrote the push-to-talk feature to always use the right option key for easier access

VoiceInk v0.26 Release Notes

✨ New Features

  • 🎯 Push to Talk Feature
  • 🤝 A direct way to purchase and get pro version of the app

VoiceInk v0.25 Release Notes

✨ New Features

  • 🎯 Initial Prompt Support: Enhance output quality with refined input prompts
  • 🤝 Discord Community Integration: Give feature requests as well as get support
